text:
### Checkin
 ```
POST /api/checkin
```

Check in or out as client. With or without a project.

Request:
```javascript
{
    	"token": "CB23C3395153D2414CE7FF22F925776DBF72BF309",   /* Login token */
    	"project": "REST",            /* Name of the project, can be empty. Not emitted on check out */
	"check_in": false /* Optional overwrite, otherwise it will be toggled */
}
```

Response success:
```javascript
{
   	"success": true,        /* If the action was successful */
    	"checked_in": true      /* If the user was checked in (otherwise checked out) */
	"text": "Checked in Emil, on project: REST"
}
```

Response failure:
```javascript
{
 	"success": false,
    	"text": "Invalid token"
}
```
title: POST checkin
